law.catch_line: Appeal of commissioner's order or decision.
law.text: All orders or decisions of the commissioner issued or made under KRS 337.020 to 337.405 may be appealed, and upon appeal an administrative hearing shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1731, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 313, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 340, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 391, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4767a-12.
